meanings.sent1: She is revising her essay to make it better.
meanings.sent2: I am revising my drawing to add more details.
meanings.sent3: He kept revising his speech until it was just right.
meanings.sent4: The artist revising the painting transformed it into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: Revising the recipe with new ingredients created a delicious dish.

meanings.sent1: After the test, I am revising my notes to remember everything.
meanings.sent2: The student spent hours revising for the upcoming exam.
meanings.sent3: She was revising the story like a detective looking for clues.
meanings.sent4: Revising the map helped them find the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The scientist revising the data discovered a new pattern.

meanings.definition: To prepare for publication or presentation
meanings.sent1: The author is revising the final draft of the book before publishing.
meanings.sent2: They are revising the slides for the important presentation.
meanings.sent3: Revising the script felt like polishing a gem to shine.
meanings.sent4: The team revising the report made sure it was error-free.
meanings.sent5: Revising the speech for the event made it more engaging.
